```{r setup, results='hide', include=FALSE}
library(DT)
library(utils)
library(knitr)
library(htmltools)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

knitr::knit_hooks$set(wrap = function(before, options, envir){
  if (before){
    paste0('<', options$wrap, ' align="center">')
  } else {
    paste0('</', options$wrap, '>')
  }
})
```
